text: Ara ami tomadera bali na -- amara kache allah‌ra dhanabhandara rayeche, ara ami adrsya sanbandhe'o jani na, ara ami bali na ye ami to ekajana phiris‌ta, ara tomadera cokhe yadera naganya bhaba tadera sanbandhe ami bali na ye allah kakhano tadera karunabhandara debena na. Allah bhala janena ya-kichu ache tadera antare, -- tahale ami alabat an'yayakaridera madhyekara hatama.’’
